Visulization of correlation matrix 2

Posted on April 22, 2009 by Cloud Wei in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Taiyun Wei, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

The plot.corr() function was updated, now it can1. Add colorkey and text labels more flexible.2. Reorder the variables using PCA or hierarchical clustering methods.3. Excellent in details.4. Other.What’s more, I found a new method to display correlation matricex, using squares with different areas and colors .See also here . Get corrplot package here.
